structure.unit: ARTICLE III. DADE COUNTY VESSEL MOORING CODE

text.section: Not more than one (1) foot of water shall be permitted to remain in the bilges of any vessel for a period of more than one (1) week. The measurement to determine the depth of water in the bilges shall be at any point along the length of the vessel, but only at points one-half the distance from the amidship line to the outboard edge of the hull or hulls measured along the horizontal plane of the main deck.
